name: Ana Rivera
notes: Evaluating tools to reduce month-end close time. Current pain: manual reconciliations, delayed reporting. Mentioned interest in audit readiness.

name: Marcus Chen
notes: Team is scaling outbound; wants better lead scoring + personalization. Concerned about brand consistency and compliance review.

name: Sara Patel
notes: Asked for examples of lifecycle campaigns. Wants faster content creation but worried about hallucinations and \sounding robotic\"."

name: Diego Alvarez
notes: Interested in automation but security-conscious. Asked about data retention and whether prompts are stored.

name: Leah Johnson
notes: Wants patient-friendly comms templates. Needs strong disclaimers; no medical advice. Prefers warm, simple language.

name: Noah Kim
notes: Exploring internal assistant for SOP lookup. Needs citations and traceability. Asked about cost predictability.
